name: Your Full Name
summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience designing and delivering scalable, high-performance web and mobile applications. Expert in React, TypeScript, Node.js, .NET Core, Python frameworks, and modern frontend and backend architectures.

Cloud & DevOps: AWS (Lambda, ECS, EC2, S3, CloudFront, RDS, API Gateway)

experience.title: Software Engineer / Full Stack Developer / etc.
bullets: Architected and delivered complex full-stack systems using React, TypeScript, Node.js, applying modern patterns such as modular monorepos and scalable state management.
Built high-performance backend services using FastAPI and Django, implementing RESTful APIs, background workers, and asynchronous processing pipelines.
Designed robust data access layers integrating PostgreSQL and MongoDB, handling transactional consistency, migrations, and query optimization.

experience.title: Senior Developer
bullets: Developed and maintained enterprise-grade applications using C# .NET, applying solid OOP principles to improve code maintainability and scalability.
Built and optimized SQL Server databases and complex T-SQL queries to support high-volume data processing.
Implemented responsive user interfaces with Angular, HTML, CSS, improving usability across desktop and mobile platforms.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
